Operation 'get_/v1/forecast' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original summary uses passive voice and lacks action clarity. Description omits critical details about customizable parameters, response structure (HourlyResponse/DailyResponse schemas), and the no-authentication requirement. Enhanced version clarifies: (1) action verb 'Retrieves' for AI agent clarity, (2) customizable parameters to help agents understand input flexibility, (3) specific response schema names for consistency with API context, (4) no-auth requirement for agent decision-making, (5) ISO8601 timestamp format mentioned in schema descriptions for completeness.

data.current_description: 7 day weather variables in hourly and daily resolution for given WGS84 latitude and longitude coordinates. Available worldwide.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a 7-day weather forecast with hourly and daily resolution for specified WGS84 latitude and longitude coordinates. Accepts parameters to customize weather variables (temperature, precipitation, wind speed, etc.), time zones, and forecast resolution. Returns HourlyResponse and DailyResponse objects containing time-series weather data arrays with ISO8601 timestamps. Available worldwide with no authentication required.
data.reasoning: Original summary uses passive voice and lacks action clarity.
